Topic.Title: Dell's Customer Service is destroying the profitability of this company

Message.Msg: Hello, I am from Dell Social Media and Community team. Please accept my sincere apologies for any inconvenience caused. I will be more than happy to help you and resolve any issue you are facing with our product or service. You can write to me on twitter @NiranjanAtDell Dell-Niranjan
who has the power to hold down this stock? considering 7 months ago, its price is above $17. it is quite amazing. maybe, mike dell should leave the company.

Message.Title: Dell makes great Laptops
Message.Msg: Dell should forget about desktop computers. Desktop computers are dinosaurs from the last Millennium. Apple and Google have the Tablet and Smartphone market. So why not make budget laptops for under $500 to blow away the competition? Here's a tip. Don't count on Windows 8 to save Dell's bacon. Windows 8 is DOA and it's a Fiasco waiting to happen, just like Windows Vista! Dell needs to fill the Windows 7 laptop demand after Microsoft tries to kill it, just like MSFT tried to kill XP. Stock up on Windows 7 licenses and have lots of sub $500 laptops ready. Even better, use AMD processors to save at least $100 per laptop. That's more profit for Dell. Cha-Ching! Capitalizing on Microsoft's Windows 8 mistake is the only for Dell to Survive!

One advantage Dell has over Apple is Laptops. Dell has lots of laptops that cost less than a low end $999 Macbook Air. Dell should just forget about high end Ultrabooks. Remember the Adamo? It was the worst crash and burn since the Hindenberg in 1937. Oh, the Humanity!
dell laptops are junk! Mine brokedown in less than a year and Dell won't honor the warranty.Dell is going to disappear.I willnever buy a dell again.

Message.Title: New Analysis on Dell Computer Corporation Suggests Drop
Message.Msg: Wow! Dell Computer Corporation is not looking good right now. MUST READ! goo.gl/5r3Yq
I agree. This is exactly what Google does. Google uses thousands of inexpensive servers running Linux, so they don't have to pay Microsoft licensing fees.
So where is my Dell Linux Laptop with an AMD processor? I want a laptop with NO WinTel Inside!

Topic.Title: DELL is a BUY form here

Message.Msg: Don't count on Windows 8 to save Dell. Try the Windows 8 release preview and see why. The 'Metro' graphical interface is the deal breaker. Microsoft hid everything useful. Where's the Control Panel for example? How do you shut it down? Geez, like Vista wasn't bad enough, now they made Windows even worse.
